reviewText: I have seen 10 Girls Gone Wild DVDs, and this one is by far the best.  All but one of the girls get totally nude, which seems to be rare for GGW.  All too often in GGW DVDs, they waste time in the scenes, and the girls end up only flashing their breasts for a few seconds.  Not here, here they all are willing to be nude. (Except for one girl who will not take off her thong.)  If you can get your hands on this, you don't need any other GGW DVDs.  All of the girls are wonderful, but the girl in the second scene is the sexiest girl I have ever seen in my life!  She is so cute, and also seems very sweet and happy.  They don't say what her name is, but I have found out that it is Stacy.  She has a tattoo that says "destiny" right above her vagina.  It is visible during a close-up of her private area while she is shaving herself in the shower.  She is so HOT!!  It's hard to describe, but there is just something about her that no other girl has.  There is also a great scene between 2 girls named Nikki and Noelle.  Noelle uses an electric razor to shave Nikki's private parts, then they take turns using it on each other as a vibrator.  We get some wonderful views of Nikki's vaginal area!  This is also rare for GGW since they don't normally show the vaginas for more then a few seconds, if at all.  After seeing this DVD, you will be tempted to buy others, but you don't need to.  All of the other GGW DVDs I have seen suck compared to this.
Got it as a gag gift for a friend. I think he actually watched it too!

This disc provides some of the most exciting images that you will ever
see for this subject matter.  If you enjoy looking at beautiful women
doing their thing, this is it.
GGW is predicable - you see what you get in each package.  This one is pretty good but run of the mill.  I do like the girls in all of them.  If you do too - this is your piece of cake.
